title: BRIEF-Avadel Pharmaceuticals Reports Q1 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.34
text:
May 2, 2018 / 11:38 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Avadel Pharmaceuticals Reports Q1 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.34 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Avadel Pharmaceuticals PLC:
* AVADEL PHARMACEUTICALS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.32
* Q1 REVENUE $33.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $29.5 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.27 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $105 MILLION TO $125 MILLION
* AVADEL PHARMACEUTICALS - CASH AND MARKETABLE SECURITIES AT MARCH 31, 2018 WERE $198.2 MILLION, UP FROM $94.1 MILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2017
* AVADEL PHARMACEUTICALS - REITERATING FY 2018 GUIDANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
